# Pull Request Process

## General steps for completing this pull request

Please review the [guidelines for contributing](CONTRIBUTING.md) to this repository.

### Checklist

Ensure that your `pull request` has followed all the steps below:

- [ ] Code compilation
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] Extended the documentation

- [ ] ðŸ› Bug fix
- [ ] ðŸ¦¯ New hook
- [ ] âœ¨ New feature for an existing hook
- [ ] ðŸ’¥ Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality)
- [ ] ðŸ“š Documentation update

### Description

> Please include a summary of the changes in your `pull request`.
